data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hDINE9StXJgQ7kNvgH3K7gV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AAs5yRebGxCw6d973oYixAc&oh=00_AYBnD6jmVt70dN129yF6C7Tud6k9_XKqYXmo2iKlAlbMBw&oe=66A8CCB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1qtFsXD-gv4Q7kNvgE5zsng&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AAs5yRebGxCw6d973oYixAc&oh=00_AYDSrKRQUFUUkTDM_KwJvbFE34q4cZ0hXcla5wLoqoJYQQ&oe=66A8DA52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kNCSCPZWXT8Q7kNvgH2C04o&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AAs5yRebGxCw6d973oYixAc&oh=00_AYBeck3XQJcVFIqXG1kEPgzKX5VClR_mJkVfwNlAQm938A&oe=66A8C589)
